nodes.text: Shrokti was a male Nautolan who served as a lieutenant in the army of the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War against the reconstituted Sith Empire. In 3640 BBY, he was stationed on the planet Ilum while a battle that took place there. During the battle, Shrokti sold equipment from a stall in the Republic base camp. While at the stall, he wore a brown and purple uniform and carried a blaster pistol. Shrokti had black eyes, no hair and green skin.
Shrokti first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a 2011 MMORPG produced by BioWare. In the game he served as a Republic social items vendor on Ilum.
